title: More Americans aware of growing problem of opioid addiction

title_detail.value: More Americans aware of growing problem of opioid addiction

summary: A new survey reveals the number of Americans who see opioid addiction as a significant issue for their community today is up significantly over just two years ago. Forty-three percent of Americans now say the misuse of prescription drugs is a serious problem, compared with 33 percent in 2016.
